name: The Ninja Warriors
overview: The Ninja Warriors is a one or two player side-scrolling beat-em-up. The player(s) control robot Ninjas, which battle their way through the levels using Shuriken and knives. As the Ninja's take damage their classic Ninja garb is torn away to reveal robotic limbs, torso or head. When the damage reaches a critical level the Ninja Robot explodes scattering mechanical body parts. Also published in Zzap!64 Megatape #36 (11/1992).
